channel.title: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day
channel.description: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: Thank you, Mr. Chairman.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: Welcome everyone to my home State of Florida!
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: We are honored to host you and I am honored to serve as the RNC Co-Chair.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: Every election we hear that this is the most important election of our lifetime. This election is more than that. It is the most important election in our nation's lifetime.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: In 1775 our Founding Fathers rose up to establish our liberty. Today, we need to defeat a President whose actions threaten our liberty!
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: In this way, we are in a similar position as our Founding Fathers. Just as they were called upon, we are being called upon. What they started, what they believed in, we must defend!
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: The danger for America is already here, in the form of the Democratic leaders in Washington.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: We have a Democrat Senate leader who refuses to meet his moral obligation to pass a budget for the government.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: We have a Democrat House leader that wouldn't allow a major piece of legislation--Obama Care--to be read before it was passed. She stated to the world, and I quote "We have to pass the bill so that you can find out what is in it."
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: We have a President that has bypassed the Senate confirmation process in order to appoint unaccountable czars to make and enforce policies on America's citizens.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: A President that by executive action has changed immigration laws, imposed unconstitutional burdens on our states, and issued over-reaching regulations. We know the problem, America--their names are Obama ­ Biden ­ Reid ­ Pelosi ­ Holder. What they have done--and will continue to do, should Obama be re-elected--runs contrary to the values we believe in and the principles we stand for.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: It is our duty, as citizen activists, of this great Republican Party, to fight to restore the values of our Founding Fathers.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: My fellow members, this fight is not just about an election, and it is not about our party.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: Our fight is about our country, and we must not lose!
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: Our Founding Fathers made huge personal sacrifices for what they believed in. The time is now for us to do the same!
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: I am a proud grassroots activist, one of many in my state and countless others from across the country.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: Today we need as many grassroots activists from all walks of life and throughout this great nation to stand with us.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: The sacrifices we need to make are nothing compared to the sacrifices our children and our grandchildren will face if we don't take back our country on November 6th.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: We must take this election house-by-house, precinct-by-precinct, city-by-city, state-by-state, to bring our proud conservative message of Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan to every voter.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: When we leave Florida in a few days, let's commit ourselves to give all that we can to help the Romney/Ryan ticket.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: Together, let's make history. Together, let's defeat Barack Obama.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: Together, let's save our country for the next generation.
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day

item.title: Thank you. God bless each of you. God bless our proud military and their families and may God continue to bless the United States of America. ###
item.author: Republican National Committee Co-Chair Sharon Day
